text:
Although it was a relatively minor engagement compared to later events of the [[Last War]], the Sky Battle of Daskaran in [[909 YK|Khorvaire calendar]] signaled a new dimension
to the war. This first aerial battle occurred between the Sky Knights of [[Aundair]] and the Wyvernriders of [[Thrane]]. The conflict was watched from the parapets of [[Daskaran]]
and fought across a vast expanse of sky. Many [[wyvern]]s, [[dragonhawk]]s, and their riders plummeted to their death, and both sides claimed victory. Because the riders came from aristocrats on both sides, the battle became a symbol of the chivalry
and honorable combat lost later in the war.
title: Sky Battle of Daskaran
tooltip: early but impactful battle during the Last War
